name: Atenciones por tipo y mes
query:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(mes_data.mes, ' - ', mes_data.tipo) AS mes_tipo,
    mes_data.cantidad
FROM (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.egreso, '%%Y-%%m')
        END AS mes,
        a.tipo,
        COUNT(*) AS cantidad
    FROM 
        tabAtencion AS a
    JOIN 
        tabAnimal AS an ON a.parent = an.name
    GROUP BY 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.egreso, '%%Y-%%m')
        END,
        a.tipo
) AS mes_data
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.egreso, '%%Y-%%m')
        END AS mes,
        COUNT(*) AS total_atenciones
    FROM 
        tabAtencion AS a
    JOIN 
        tabAnimal AS ani ON a.parent = ani.name
    GROUP BY 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.egreso, '%%Y-%%m')
        END
) AS total_data
ON mes_data.mes = total_data.mes
ORDER BY 
    (mes_data.mes = 'En proceso') DESC,  
    mes_data.mes ASC,
    mes_data.cantidad DESC;
